subdialogue_text: Well, you look reasonably sane.
I am a knight of Catarina.
I've managed to track down this cathedral's store of treasure.
It's right over there, across that narrow part.
Treasure...hmm. Always so close, yet so far...
I'm in quite a pickle, indeed...
Hmm... Hmm...
Just hold your horses a moment.
I know, I know, treasure is so sorely tempting...
Hmm... Hmm...
What's happened, friend?
Stop this! Stop this at once!
Gods' spit, I knew something was wrong!
Well, now it's my turn.
I'm Unbreakable Patches, nobody can crack me!
Rot in hell!
Close call, blimey...
Why me? Why me?!
Shame on you, you greedy guts.
Shame on you, you insatiable wench.
Shame on you, you rotten cleric.
Shame on you, you rotten nun.
Thought you could outwit an onion?
Well, say hello to the nice giant! He adores visitors.

behavior: #0After he betrays the protagonist if they have already killed the giant
subdialogue_text: Huh? Where's the old giant?

behavior: #0After he betrays the protagonist if they have already killed the giant
subdialogue_text: What! Where's the bloody giant!

behavior: #0After he betrays the protagonist if they have already killed the giant
subdialogue_text: Just what have you done?!

behavior: #0After he betrays the protagonist if they have already killed the giant
subdialogue_text: How dare you! Have you no shame!

behavior: #0After he betrays the protagonist if they have already killed the giant
subdialogue_text: Damn! Damn! Damn!
Oh, yes, oh, hello, I don't believe we've met.
I'm Patches. Unbreakable Patches.
You seem to be Unkindled.
Do you have business with me?
Of course not, we have just met, after all.
Sorry, I've been a bit on edge. Forget I even asked.
Ahh, but this is your lucky day.
I happen to be a world-renowned travelling merchant.

If you're as Unkindled as you look,
you'll find many a useful thing here.

behavior: #0Choose "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text: Ah, oh, yes, of course...It's coming back to me, now.

behavior: #0Choose "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text:
Oh, I am so sorry. That was my hand, as you know,
but the deed, well, that was the armour's doing.

behavior: #0Choose "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text:
Regrettable, truly.
But behold, I'm stripped clean of that unruly attire.

behavior: #0Choose "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text: And look at you, not a scratch!

behavior: #0Choose "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text: All's well that ends well, right?

behavior: #0Choose "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text:
Yes, we'll be fine, I can tell,
it's that rotten curse, it is, the untidy mess.

behavior: #0Choose "You know who I am" to the query
#0Talk-1st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text:
Oh, ahh, yes,
now, it wasn't me, but you still deserve an apology.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text: Just a little trinket. Go ahead, it's yours now.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
#0Talk-1st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text: You should know, I'm a kind of traveling merchant.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text:
If you're as Unkindled as you look,
you'll find plenty of good stuff.

behavior: #0Talk-2st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text: Oh, yes, yes, what can I do?

behavior: #0Talk-2st time after choosing "You know who I am" to the query
subdialogue_text: Can't resist it, can you? My sumptuous selection.

behavior: #0Talk-After the Decons of the Deep have been defeated
subdialogue_text: Oh, hello again. Welcome to Patches' boutique of wonders.

behavior: #0Talk-After the Decons of the Deep have been defeated
subdialogue_text: Can't resist it, can you? My sumptuous selection.

subdialogue_text: Can't find anything you like?

subdialogue_text: Well, you could try looking a little harder...

subdialogue_text: Thanks, good compeer.

subdialogue_text: Thanks, sweeting.
Oi, calm down, please!
Forgive me! I'm on my hands and knees!
All's well that ends well, right!
Damn, you heartless, good-for-nothing oaf!
Damn, you heartless little harlot!
Well, now it's my turn.
I'm Unbreakable Patches, nobody can crack me!
Rot in hell!
Cough 'em up, every last one of 'em.
Confess your sins.
What did I ever do, anyway?

behavior: #0After he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: Sorry, friend.

behavior: #0After he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: Be more careful! By the gods, curiosity is going to kill you kittens.

behavior: #0After he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: Some places are better left alone, you know.

behavior: #0After he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: Oh, sorry, am I a tad too late?

behavior: #0After he locks the protagonist in the tower
#0Talk-1st time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: Have no fear, there's beauty in death.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: Besides, you're surrounded by ladies. Every man's dream, right?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: Besides, you're amongst your own. Plenty of company, right?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text:
Besides, you're surrounded by ladies.
Every rotten cleric's dream, right?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
#0Talk-2nd time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: Oh, no matter, I'll look after things.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: By stripping every last trinket off your corpse.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after he locks the protagonist in the tower
subdialogue_text: You're going to make some lucky customer very happy!

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after he locks the protagonist in the tower

subdialogue_text: Ah, oh, you, you're alive...
Now, hold your horses, let's have a nice talk about this.

I'll come clean, I did you wrong.
I didn't mean it, though, not one bit.

You get these...urges...running the business and all...
Oh, and I hate myself for it, I do.

You know what I mean? Terrible, really.
But I can see you'll forgive me.

You're alive, after all,
and that's what counts, right?
Oh, fantastic! A wily second chance!
I knew you'd understand, I just knew it.

The heart of a lion.
A model for the rest of us. A true friend, forever.

behavior: #0Choose "Do not forgive him" to the query
subdialogue_text: Oh, for heaven's sake, no need to jest with a face like that.

behavior: #0Choose "Do not forgive him" to the query
subdialogue_text: You're still alive, and I'm here grovelling in the dirt, so to speak.

behavior: #0Choose "Do not forgive him" to the query
subdialogue_text: Oh, I know! Here, a token of my sincerity. Right and proper, eh?

behavior: #0Choose "Do not forgive him" to the query
subdialogue_text: We're just a couple of outcasts, let's make the best of it!

behavior: #0Choose "Do not forgive him" to the query

subdialogue_text: Oh, yes yes, what can I do?
Aren't you glad we made good of things?
Oh, hello again. Welcome to Patches' boutique of wonders.
Can't resist it, can you? My sumptuous selection.
We're just a couple of outcasts, let's make the best of it!

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time after Greirat has arrived in the Firelink Shrine
subdialogue_text: Ahh, I see you've met Greirat.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time after Greirat has arrived in the Firelink Shrine
subdialogue_text:
The slinking rodent.
But he did me a good turn back in Lothric dungeon.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time after Greirat has arrived in the Firelink Shrine
subdialogue_text:
Doubtless I should do something about that little debt,
or...maybe not.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time after Greirat has arrived in the Firelink Shrine
subdialogue_text: Well, I can hardly believe he's still standing.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time after Greirat has arrived in the Firelink Shrine

subdialogue_text: Hey, what happened to Greirat, anyhow?
I haven't seen him at all lately.
If you know where he's scurried off to, be sure and tell me.

I need to stock up, and if he's gone and croaked,
he'll have left a gold mine.
Right, yes, I see how it is.
Some things can't be divulged. Even between friends.
It comes with the territory, I know.
But if you happen to recall any details, do be a saint.
Do it for old Patch's boutique of wonders, at least.
Well? Happen to recall anything important?
About where that old rat scurried off to.

behavior: #0Choose "Tell him" 1st time after Greirat has gone to Irithyll
subdialogue_text: What? Gone all the way to Irithyll, has he?

behavior: #0Choose "Tell him" 1st time after Greirat has gone to Irithyll
subdialogue_text: Well, there can't be much left of that frozen sprawl.

behavior: #0Choose "Tell him" 1st time after Greirat has gone to Irithyll
subdialogue_text: The old rat, he's gone off the deep end this time...

behavior: #0Choose "Tell him" 2nd time after Greirat has gone to Irithyll
subdialogue_text: The old rat, he's gone off the deep end this time...

behavior: #0Choose "Tell him" 1st time after Greirat has gone to Lothric Castle
subdialogue_text: Hmph. Off to Lothric, the castle of no return...

behavior: #0Choose "Tell him" 1st time after Greirat has gone to Lothric Castle
subdialogue_text: That old thief's lost it if he thinks he has a chance in there.

behavior: #0Choose "Tell him" 1st time after Greirat has gone to Lothric Castle
subdialogue_text: It's not like he's new to this game, what's gotten into him?

behavior: #0Choose "Tell him" 2nd time after Greirat has gone to Lothric Castle
subdialogue_text: That old thief, he's really lost it this time...
Well, look at you. The luckiest man in the world.
Well, look at you. The luckiest lass in the world.

I just got hold of some truly fine treasure.
And for you, I'll practically give it away.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or leaving abruptly, without purchasing something
subdialogue_text: Can't find anything you like?

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or leaving abruptly, without purchasing something
subdialogue_text: Well, you could try looking a little harder...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, after purchasing something
subdialogue_text: Thanks, good compeer.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" or after leaving abruptly, after purchasing something
subdialogue_text: Thanks, sweeting.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing, once he has visited Lothric Castle
subdialogue_text: Now, just wait, that's the best you can do? Bloody hell.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing, once he has visited Lothric Castle
subdialogue_text:
Yeah, keep those purse strings nice and tight.
So tight they choke you.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing, once he has visited Lothric Castle
subdialogue_text: What do you say? Brilliant stuff, eh?

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing, once he has visited Lothric Castle
subdialogue_text: I won't ask for thanks, but I certainly deserve it.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing, once he has visited Lothric Castle

subdialogue_text: What's happened, friend?
Stop this! Stop this at once!
Gods' spit, I knew something was wrong!
Well, now it's my turn.
I'm Unbreakable Patches, nobody can crack me!
Rot in hell!
Close call, blimey...
Why me? Why me?!
Oh, look at you, you've got your head screwed on correct.
Fantastic. To meet a kindred spirit, on this godsforsaken crag.

Call me Lapp.
I can't remember my real name, so let's just go with that.

I have a feeling we're going to make a fabulous team.
Oh, you'll see, you'll see!
Ohh, in all honesty there's something I should tell you...

I'm...a Hollow.
Yes, I try to play it off, but I haven't a clue about my past.

Who I was, or what I lived for.
Not even my own blessed name.
That's why I've come here, searching.
For the Purging Monument, said to be in the Ringed City,

where the pygmies,
who found the Dark Soul at the dawn of fire, reside.

All I can say is... Those little stones
aren't doing much to help me remember anymore...
Well, that's the long and short of it.
So, if I completely forget who you are, don't be wrath with me.
C'mon, what else can I say? I'm a bloody Hollow, for heaven's sake.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time at his 2nd location, after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: Oh, I know who you are.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time at his 2nd location, after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: Great to see you still in once piece.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time at his 2nd location, after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: Cor, I can see why they call this the dreg-heap at the world's end.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time at his 2nd location, after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: ...Mangled remnants from every age, and every land...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time at his 2nd location, after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: It actually sort of lends credence to the old rumours.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time at his 2nd location, after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: That the Ringed City rests below it all.
Ah, don't mind me. You needn't worry yourself with this nonsense.

I just wanted to tell someone, and I'm sick of old humpty.
I should stay quiet.
Wait, I'll make it up to you, by letting you in on a secret of sorts.

Past here, you'll find the remains of a giant earthen tower
half-submerged in a poisonous swamp.

Not a very nice place to visit...
Only, there's precious treasure in the thick of the swamp.

I didn't have any use for it, you see.
So sorry, I left the whole package behind.

If I get the chance, I could go fetch it for you,
but if that's too long to wait, go nab it for yourself.

...I know who you are.
A righteous warrior, yes? With a solemn duty, to boot.
Well, grab that treasure, that's as good a duty as any.

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location, after retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text: Ohh, look at you, you found the treasure.

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location, after retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text: Dashing, just dashing. You'll make good use of it, I'm sure.

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location, after retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text: Now, this is a little toast, from me to you.

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location, after retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text:
Not much to speak of, but bottoms up.
To the greatest warrior there is.

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location, after retrieving the Titanite Slab
#0Talk-After entering the Ringed City without retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text: Oh, there you are, perfect timing.

behavior: #0Talk-After entering the Ringed City without retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text: You remember that treasure, in the thick of the poison swamp?

behavior: #0Talk-After entering the Ringed City without retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text: Well, I fetched it for you, as promised.

behavior: #0Talk-After entering the Ringed City without retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text:
Oh, it was only a hop and a skip.
I needed a rest from old nan over there.

behavior: #0Talk-After entering the Ringed City without retrieving the Titanite Slab
subdialogue_text:
Here, go ahead, it's yours.
Maybe it'll help you with that solemn duty of yours.

behavior: #0Talk-After entering the Ringed City without retrieving the Titanite Slab
#0Talk-At his 3rd location, after acquiring Titanite Slab either two methods
subdialogue_text: This really is a dreg-heap at the world's end.

subdialogue_text: ...Mangled remnants from every age, and every land...

behavior: #0Talk-At his 3rd location, after acquiring Titanite Slab either two methods

behavior: #0Talk-At his 3rd location, after acquiring Titanite Slab either two methods
subdialogue_text: That the Ringed City rests below it all.
Oh, well, fancy meeting you here.

A true blessing, that we should seek the same place,
and find ourselves standing here, together.
I've got the last of my brew. Let's have our own little toast with it.
To my search, and to your duty. And to the joy that lies before us.
All right, then. Bottoms up!
Now, I'm off in search of the Purging Monument.
Once I find it, everything will come back to me.
Who I was, what I lived for, what my name was.
And... What terrible grudges I held.

...I dunno, I just have this feeling.
That that's the kind of man I was.
Oh, don't hold it against me, I only think I was!
Now, I'm off in search of the Purging Monument.
Once I find it, everything will come back to me.

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: Oh, and here we are again.

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: How goes things? I'm rather running in circles, I'm afraid.

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text:
I can't find the Purging Monument.
And I've searched high and low...

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: What if it was never here in the first place?

behavior: #0Talk-At his 2nd location after exhausting his dialogue at the 1st
subdialogue_text: Ah, bloody hell, what do I know...

behavior: #0Choose "I do not know" to the 1st query, or "Say nothing" to the 2nd
subdialogue_text: Sorry, I know it doesn't concern you...

behavior: #0Choose "I do not know" to the 1st query, or "Say nothing" to the 2nd
subdialogue_text:
Seeing you all good and well,
I...I just sort of spilled my guts to you.

behavior: #0Choose "I do not know" to the 1st query, or "Say nothing" to the 2nd
subdialogue_text: Just forget it all. Like a good Hollow would!

behavior: #0Choose "I do not know" to the 1st query, or "Say nothing" to the 2nd

subdialogue_text: ...What did I come here in search of?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "I do not know"  or "Say nothing"
subdialogue_text: ...Damn, stop it, I'm unbreakable, unbreakable...

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I do not know"  or "Say nothing"
subdialogue_text: ...Ahh, please, someone tell me...

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "I do not know"  or "Say nothing"
subdialogue_text: ..Who am I? Why am I here?

behavior: #0Choose "Speak of the Purging Monument", praying at Purging Monument
subdialogue_text: Are you certain of that?

behavior: #0Choose "Speak of the Purging Monument", praying at Purging Monument
subdialogue_text: No, sorry, I know you'd never lie to me.

behavior: #0Choose "Speak of the Purging Monument", praying at Purging Monument
subdialogue_text: Thank you, thank you kindly. I'll speed right on over.

behavior: #0Choose "Speak of the Purging Monument", praying at Purging Monument
subdialogue_text: ...It won't be long now, before I know everything.

behavior: #0Choose "Speak of the Purging Monument", praying at Purging Monument
subdialogue_text: Who I was, what I lived for, and what my name was.

behavior: #0Choose "Speak of the Purging Monument", praying at Purging Monument
subdialogue_text: And I'll have you to thank for it all.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "Speak of the Purging Monument"
subdialogue_text: Ahh, thank you, most sincerely.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "Speak of the Purging Monument"
subdialogue_text: I swear upon my birth name.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "Speak of the Purging Monument"
subdialogue_text:
That I am your friend.
No matter what might come out, no matter what I was.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after choosing "Speak of the Purging Monument"
subdialogue_text:
If you would do me the honour,
allow me to be a true friend, always.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "Speak of the Purging Monument"
subdialogue_text: ...It won't be long now, before I know everything.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "Speak of the Purging Monument"

subdialogue_text: And I'll have you to thank for it all.
What's wrong, friend?
Stop it! Oh, please!
Bloody hell! Lost your mind, have you?
Then I have no choice! Forgive me!
Forgive me, friend.
I cannot die just yet.
Perhaps...I deserved this...
Oh, finally, you've come.

Now I know exactly who I was.
And for that, I've a little thanks to be giving.

Go this way, and peep past the broken staircase.
Some awfully fine treasure's just sitting there all alone.
It'll change your life...
I've much to thank you for, so I'll say it again and again.

Go this way, and peep past the broken staircase.
Some awfully fine treasure's just sitting there all alone.
What, don't you believe me?

subdialogue_text: Every age, it seems, is tainted by the greed of men.

behavior: #0After approaching the ledge, where he shoves the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Rubbish, to one such as I, devoid of all worldly wants!

behavior: #0After approaching the ledge, where he shoves the protagonist
#0After approaching the ledge, where he shoves the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Hmmm, I dunno, maybe it's just the way we are.

behavior: #0After approaching the ledge, where he shoves the protagonist
subdialogue_text: I'll stick you in my prayers. A fine dark soul, to you.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-1st time at his 3rd location

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-2nd time at his 3rd location
subdialogue_text: Stop that! Enough of that!

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile at his 3rd location
subdialogue_text: Bloody hell, you've lost your head, have you?

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile at his 3rd location
subdialogue_text: Then, let's have a go, shall we.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile at his 3rd location
subdialogue_text: I'm unbreakable! You can't crack me!

subdialogue_text: Everything always goes to pot, doesn't it...
